verses.kjv: And he said unto me, Son of man, stand upon thy feet, and I will speak unto thee.
verses.web: He said to me, “Son of man, stand on your feet, and I will speak with you.”
verses.ct: He said to me, "Son of man, stand up on your feet, and I will speak to you."

verses.kjv: And the spirit entered into me when he spake unto me, and set me upon my feet, that I heard him that spake unto me.
verses.web: The Spirit entered into me when he spoke to me, and set me on my feet; and I heard him who spoke to me.
verses.ct: As he spoke, the Spirit entered me and lifted me to my feet, and I listened to the one who was speaking to me.

verses.kjv: And he said unto me, Son of man, I send thee to the children of Israel, to a rebellious nation that hath rebelled against me: they and their fathers have transgressed against me, even unto this very day.
verses.web: He said to me, “Son of man, I send you to the children of Israel, to a nation of rebels who have rebelled against me. They and their fathers have transgressed against me even to this very day.
verses.ct: He said to me, "Son of man, I am sending you to the people of Israel — a rebellious nation that has rebelled against me. They and their ancestors have defied me right up to this very day.

verses.kjv: For they are impudent children and stiffhearted. I do send thee unto them; and thou shalt say unto them, Thus saith the Lord GOD.
verses.web: The children are impudent and stiff-hearted. I am sending you to them, and you shall tell them, ‘This is what the Lord LORD says.’
verses.ct: These people are stubborn and hard-hearted. I am sending you to them, and you will tell them, 'This is what the Lord GOD says.'

verses.kjv: And they, whether they will hear, or whether they will forbear, (for they are a rebellious house,) yet shall know that there hath been a prophet among them.
verses.web: They, whether they will hear, or whether they will refuse, for they are a rebellious house, yet they will know that there has been a prophet among them.
verses.ct: Whether they listen or refuse to listen — because they are a rebellious people — they will know that a prophet has been among them.

verses.kjv: And thou, son of man, be not afraid of them, neither be afraid of their words, though briers and thorns be with thee, and thou dost dwell among scorpions: be not afraid of their words, nor be dismayed at their looks, though they be a rebellious house.
verses.web: You, son of man, don’t be afraid of them, neither be afraid of their words, though briers and thorns are with you, and you dwell among scorpions. Don’t be afraid of their words, nor be dismayed at their looks, though they are a rebellious house.
verses.ct: As for you, son of man, don't be afraid of them. Don't be afraid of their words, even though you're surrounded by briers and thorns and living among scorpions. Don't fear what they say, and don't be shaken by the way they look at you, even though they are a rebellious people.

verses.kjv: And thou shalt speak my words unto them, whether they will hear, or whether they will forbear: for they are most rebellious.
verses.web: You shall speak my words to them, whether they will hear, or whether they will refuse; for they are most rebellious.
verses.ct: You will speak my words to them whether they listen or refuse, because they are deeply rebellious.

verses.kjv: But thou, son of man, hear what I say unto thee; Be not thou rebellious like that rebellious house: open thy mouth, and eat that I give thee.
verses.web: But you, son of man, hear what I tell you. Don’t be rebellious like that rebellious house. Open your mouth, and eat that which I give you.”
verses.ct: But you, son of man — listen to what I'm telling you. Don't be rebellious like they are. Open your mouth and eat what I give you."

verses.kjv: And when I looked, behold, an hand was sent unto me; and, lo, a roll of a book was therein;
verses.web: When I looked, behold, a hand was stretched out to me; and, behold, a scroll of a book was in it.
verses.ct: Then I looked, and I saw a hand reaching out toward me, holding a scroll.

verses.kjv: And he spread it before me; and it was written within and without: and there was written therein lamentations, and mourning, and woe.
verses.web: He spread it before me. It was written within and without; and lamentations, mourning, and woe were written in it.
verses.ct: He unrolled it in front of me, and it was covered with writing on both sides — words of lament, mourning, and woe.
